Subject: RE: [junit] Reporting more then 1 failed assertion per test
From: Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@...>

> I think Jeff has hit the nail on the head, I too would like to be
> able to get some feedback when the number of asserts has changed
> for the same reasons.
> 
> Seems to me that the simplest thing that could possibly work is
> to count the asserts.

If Erich/Kent give their ok, it will be done in the next release (or even sooner if we have a 3.7.1 release)

I am not a "assert count" fan (because I _personnaly_ don't need it and I don't see the real added value) but if other people really want this feature, I vote for it.

-Vlad
subject: RE: [junit] Reporting more then 1 failed assertion per test
